content: I think I'll check out Azul and Qwirkle. They seem like great options for a casual game night with my girlfriend. I've heard great things about Azul, and Qwirkle looks like a fun, relaxing game. By the way, speaking of relaxing games, I've been thinking about getting back into Magic: The Gathering. I used to play all the time in high school, and I saw an ad for a new set release that got me nostalgic for the game. Do you think it's worth getting back into?
